item.description:
On to week 4!
Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!


If you are looking get in some time to walk, want to train with us, or are runner of your own, please join us every and any Monday and Wednesday night at BHS.

http://www.coolrunnin...

The training is a little different this week.
Couch to 5K, Week 4 Plan:
(3x during the week)

Brisk five-minute warmup walk.
Jog 1/4 mile (1 lap)
Walk 1/8 mile (1/2 lap)
Jog 1/2 mile (2 laps)
Walk 1/4 mile (1 lap)
Jog 1/4 mile (1 lap)
Walk 1/8 (1/2 lap)
Jog 1/2 mile (2 laps)


Wednesday, August 4th
6:30pm
Braintree High School
Track
Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

Organizer(s): Julie

Min/Max: none

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Wednesday, August 4th

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do my best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 2pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Couch to 5K week 4, Walkers and Joggers Welcome!
